snippet: This recipe is inspired by Turkish lamb dumplings, or manti. It does not compromise that savory, near-sacred combination of butter, lamb, garlic and yogurt....

multimedia.credit: Andrew Scrivani for The New York Times
Andrew Scrivani for The New York Times

lead_paragraph: This recipe is inspired by Turkish lamb dumplings, or manti. It does not compromise that savory, near-sacred combination of butter, lamb, garlic and yogurt.

headline.name: Pasta With Turkish-Style Lamb, Eggplant and Yogurt Sauce
